Headline: #70 Division Temporary Reroute near Division/Kostner
ShortDescription: 70 Division buses temp. rerouted WB: Division, Kostner, Chicago Ave., Cicero, and Division; EB: Division, Cicero, Chicago Ave., Kostner and Division.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How will this affect my trip?

#70 Division buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Division/Kostner, due to street blockage near Division/Kostner.

Westbound buses will operate via Division, Kostner, Chicago Avenue, Cicero, Division and over regular route.

Eastbound buses will operate via Division, Cicero, Chicago Avenue, Kostner, Division and over regular route.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #65 Grand Temporary Reroute at Grand/Hoyne
ShortDescription: 65 Grand buses are temporarily rerouted via Grand, Western, Chicago Avenue, Damen and Grand due to, street blockage near Grand/Hoyne.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#65 Grand buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Grand, Western, Chicago Avenue, Damen, Grand and over regular route, due to street blockage near Grand/Hoyne.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #85 Central Temporary Reroute at Central/West End
ShortDescription: 85 Central buses are temporarily rerouted via Central, Washington, Laramie, Lake  & Central, due to police department activity near Central/West End

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#85 Central buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Central, Washington, Laramie, Lake, then resume their normal route at Central, due to police department activity near Central/West End

Allow extra travel time.
